alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County; Southern Mountains; Southwest Utah; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 9:21AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON... NORTHWESTERN KANE AND SOUTHEASTERN IRON COUNTIES... At 916 AM MST...an area of heavy snow was falling from near Parowan to Pintura, including Cedar City. Locations impacted include... Cedar City, Zion National Park, Enoch, Parowan, Paragonah, Cedar Breaks National Monument, Summit, Kanarraville, Brian Head, Hamilton Fort, Pintura and Kolob Canyon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 30 and 80. Utah Route 56 between mile markers 54 and 61. * winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow, leading to blowing snow. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow. UDOT sensors and public reports indicate slick roads. Reduce driving speeds if traveling through this area.

area.areaDesc: Lower Washington County; Southern Mountains; Southwest Utah; Zion National Park
